long_description: Use natural aromatic scents to repel insects while you wash--its lingering essence continues to repel long after the wash water is thrown out. Completely bio-degradable formula features insect-repelling citronella, plus soothing lavender and peppermint oils. Just a few drops of this super-concentrated formula supplies ample suds for all your camp cleaning chores. Works well in hot water, cold water, or even salt water! Contains purified water, vegetable-based biodegradable anionic and non-ionic cleaning agents, natural fragrance, oils and germaben.
short_description: Use natural aromatic scents to repel insects while you wash--its lingering essence continues to repel long after the wash water is thrown out.
